review: I bought this worthless piece of garbage for the sole purpose of watching the World Cup.I was traveling a lot and wanted to alleviate any worry that I would miss World Cup matches in the event that ESPN wasn't available at my destinations.Unfortunately, it would frequently stop "casting" during the matches, causing me to miss many of the best moments.At first I was angry at the WatchESPN app, but soon found that Netflix and HBOGo both experienced frequent pausing, disconnections, delays, etc.I tried everything I could think of: restarting the chromecast; restarting  the TV; restarting the apps; restarting the wifi modem. You name it, I I tried it. The only common denominator was the chromecast.The only consistency was consistent failure. Regardless of my location, time of day, signal strength, this thing was worthless. I ended up watching several matches on my iPad, which worked great aside from the tiny screen.I suppose my options are to spend more money on a Roku and hope it actually works, or bring my big, heavy playstation with me when I travel (not happening).
